translation.en: -Mommy, I'm sleepy. -Shh, shh.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我困了

translation.en: Shh, shh. Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们走

translation.en: Daddy.
translation.zh: 妈妈

translation.en: "Shoop."
translation.zh: “睡觉觉”

translation.en: We're gonna do "Shoop" later.
translation.zh: 我们等下再“睡觉觉”

translation.en: -"Shoop." -Shh, shh.
translation.zh: “睡觉觉”

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在干吗？

translation.en: -[banging on hood] -Hey, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 嘿 你在干吗？

translation.en: Hey, wait!
translation.zh: 嘿 等一下！

translation.en: Ten on 2, please.
translation.zh: 十块钱2号油枪

translation.en: [Tania on voicemail] Leave a message or don't, you do you.
translation.zh: 请留言 或者不留言 随便你

translation.en: Leave a message or don't, you do you.
translation.zh: 请留言 或者不留言 随便你

translation.en: I'm gonna find us some place to sleep. I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 我去给咱俩找个睡觉的地方马上就回来

translation.en: -Alex? -Thank God you're here.
translation.zh: -亚历克斯？-谢天谢地你在家

translation.en: I'm sorry to barge in like this. I called you, you didn't pick up.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉贸然过来我给你打了电话 但你没接

translation.en: -I didn't know where else to go. -What's wrong? Are you okay?
translation.zh: -我无处可去了-怎么了？你没事吧？

translation.en: It's not Maddy, is it?
translation.zh: 麦蒂没出什么事吧？

translation.en: No, Maddy and I just need a place to crash for tonight.
translation.zh: 不 我和麦蒂只是今晚需要一个睡觉的地方

translation.en: Can I crash here until I figure out what I'm doing?
translation.zh: 在我想好下一步之前我能先住你这里吗？

translation.en: God, of course. Get in here.
translation.zh: 老天 当然可以 快进来

translation.en: -Are the guys from the Swan here? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -天鹅酒吧的那些人在这里吗？-对

translation.en: Thought I heard your voice. Come inside. We got some sick dank from Humboldt.
translation.zh: 我就说听着是你 快进来我们从洪堡弄了些超爽的大麻

translation.en: -[man 1] Gotta get it. -[man 2] Do it.
translation.zh: -一定得吸一口-吸吧

translation.en: -Yeah. -All right. Pass it. Chill.
translation.zh: -好-好 递来 放松

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: -Next time. -Come on. He's already on his way over.
translation.zh: -下次吧-来吧 他已经在路上了

translation.en: He knows he drank too much. Hear him out. He wants to talk.
translation.zh: 他知道他喝多了听他解释一下 他想跟你聊聊

translation.en: -Don't be a bitch. -Ethan!
translation.zh: -别不讲情面嘛-伊森！

translation.en: -Sorry-- -I'm good. I'm all right.
translation.zh: -对不起…-我没事 没关系

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: 没事的

translation.en: -Do you have some place to go? -I'm good.
translation.zh: -那你有地方去吗？-我没事

translation.en: "Shoop."
translation.zh: “睡觉觉”

translation.en: -[cell phone pings] -Mm-mm.
translation.zh: （塔尼娅：你有地方去吗？）

translation.en: "Shoop" is asleep, Maddy.
translation.zh: “睡觉觉”就得好好睡 麦蒂

translation.en: "Shoop."
translation.zh: “睡觉觉”

translation.en: Can you try to close your eyes?
translation.zh: 你能试着闭上眼睛睡觉吗？

translation.en: "Shoop."
translation.zh: “睡觉觉”

translation.en: Okay, I know you want "Shoop."
translation.zh: 好 我知道你想“睡觉觉”

translation.en: I know you want "Shoop."
translation.zh: 我知道你想“睡觉觉”

translation.en: Mommy wants to ask the last owner if he jammed any other mixtape in here.
translation.zh: 妈妈想问问上一任车主看他有没有塞一张混音磁带进去

translation.en: -Hey, there we go. There we go. -["Shoop" playing over stereo]
translation.zh: 嘿 可以了

translation.en: [Maddy] Mommy.
translation.zh: 妈妈

translation.en: That's okay. We're gonna freestyle it. That's what we're gonna do.
translation.zh: 没关系 我们可以即兴创作我们就这么做

translation.en: ♪ You're packed and you're stacked 'Specially in the back ♪
translation.zh: 你老二巨大 肌肉发达尤其是那臀部

translation.en: ♪ Brother, wanna thank your mother For a butt like that ♪
translation.zh: 兄弟 一定要感谢你妈给你生出那副屁股

translation.en: ♪ Can I get some fries With that shake-shake booty ♪
translation.zh: 你的巨乳颤颤巍巍 让我心花纷飞

translation.en: ♪ If looks could kill... ♪
translation.zh: 如果美貌可以杀人…

translation.en: Gotta move, ma'am. You can't sleep here.
translation.zh: 女士 把车子开走 你不能在这里睡觉

translation.en: Ma'am.
translation.zh: 女士

translation.en: You can't sleep here.
translation.zh: 你不能在这里睡觉

translation.en: -Isn't this public property? -You can't park here.
translation.zh: -这里不是公共区域吗？-你不能在这里停车

translation.en: Got nowhere to be, go to a Walmart parking lot or to social services.
translation.zh: 你要是无处可去就去沃尔玛停车场或社会服务机构

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Now.
translation.zh: 现在

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: [man] Russell.
translation.zh: 拉塞尔

translation.en: That's us. Let's get it.
translation.zh: 到我们了 走吧

translation.en: -Russell? -[Alex] Russell, coming.
translation.zh: -拉塞尔？-拉塞尔这就过去

translation.en: So you're looking for a big, fat government handout
translation.zh: 所以你想申请政府丰厚的救济

translation.en: because you are a jobless, white trash, piece of shit, am I right?
translation.zh: 因为你是个无业的白人人渣 对吧？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Your form? You're gonna give that to me.
translation.zh: 你的表格呢？你得把申请表给我

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: All right. The child in your lap is Maddy.
translation.zh: 好 坐在你膝盖上的这孩子是麦蒂

translation.en: -And Schmariel. -What?
translation.zh: -还有施密瑞尔-什么？

translation.en: Uh, it's the Ariel that we got from a dollar store.
translation.zh: 是我们从一元店买的美人鱼玩具

translation.en: So we call her Schmariel.
translation.zh: 我们给她起名“施密瑞尔”

translation.en: -Are you the child's legal guardian? -[Alex] Yes.
translation.zh: -你是孩子的法定监护人吗？-对

translation.en: Can you prove that?
translation.zh: 你能证明吗？

translation.en: Uh, I can show you my stretch marks.
translation.zh: 我可以给你看看我的妊娠纹

translation.en: Are you under the influence of any drugs or alcohol?
translation.zh: 你没有吸毒或喝酒吧？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Are you sure?
translation.zh: 你确定吗？

translation.en: Because you look strung out.
translation.zh: 因为你看起来精神恍惚

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: We slept in a car last night.
translation.zh: 我们昨晚在车里睡的觉

translation.en: So you're homeless?
translation.zh: 所以你们无家可归？

translation.en: No. No, I wouldn't say that.
translation.zh: 不 我不会那么说

translation.en: So you have a home?
translation.zh: 所以你们有家？

translation.en: I had a home and then we left it.
translation.zh: 我是有家 但我们离开了

translation.en: Maddy's dad is, um-- He drinks and, uh...
translation.zh: 麦蒂的爸爸…他有酗酒问题 然后…

translation.en: He blacks out and punches stuff.
translation.zh: 总是喝晕过去 看到什么都拳打脚踢

translation.en: Is this some kind of fucking fairy tale, Alex?
translation.zh: 这他妈的是什么童话吗 亚历克斯？

translation.en: -[Jody] Punches you? -No.
translation.zh: -他打你吗？-不打

translation.en: -Punches Maddy? -[Alex] No. No.
translation.zh: -那打麦蒂吗？-没有

translation.en: Just...
translation.zh: 就是…

translation.en: Last night, um...
translation.zh: 昨晚…

translation.en: Last night was different and I got scared.
translation.zh: 昨晚有点不对劲 我就怕了

translation.en: Did you file a police report?
translation.zh: 那你有报警吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Do you wanna call the cops now? It's not too late.
translation.zh: 你想现在报警吗？这还不晚

translation.en: And say what? That he didn't hit me?
translation.zh: 然后说什么？说他没打我？

translation.en: There's shelters for domestic violence victims,
translation.zh: 有那种家庭暴力救助站

translation.en: but you need to go on record with your abuse.
translation.zh: 但警察那里得有你被家暴的记录

translation.en: I'm not abused.
translation.zh: 我没有被家暴

translation.en: Okay, hon.
translation.zh: 好 亲爱的

translation.en: So according to you, you're not abused and you're not homeless.
translation.zh: 所以据你所说 你没被家暴也不是无家可归

translation.en: Why are you here?
translation.zh: 那你来这里做什么？

translation.en: We don't have anywhere to sleep tonight.
translation.zh: 我们没有地方睡觉

translation.en: What about mom? It says here she's local.
translation.zh: 那你妈呢？这上面说她是本地人

translation.en: I would rather sleep in my car.
translation.zh: 我宁愿睡自己的车里

translation.en: Dad?
translation.zh: 你爸呢？

translation.en: My family is not an option.
translation.zh: 我没办法求助自己的家人

translation.en: Are you currently employed?
translation.zh: 那你现在有工作吗？

translation.en: -Nope. -You went to six different high schools?
translation.zh: -没有-你曾在六所不同的高中读书？

translation.en: Yeah, my mom moved around a lot and then eventually I got my GED in 2016.
translation.zh: 对 我妈经常搬家我2016年才拿到高中同等学历证书

translation.en: Any college, technical schools?
translation.zh: 那你读过大学或技校吗？

translation.en: I got into college...
translation.zh: 我被大学录取…

translation.en: um, but I didn't go.
translation.zh: 但没去上

translation.en: Is there anything that you can give me?
translation.zh: 那你能告诉我你会什么吗？

translation.en: Any special skills?
translation.zh: 某种特别的技能？

translation.en: On your mark, get set, go!
translation.zh: 就位、预备、跑！

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: All right. Here's the deal.
translation.zh: 好吧 情况是这样的

translation.en: I need two pay stubs in order to get you on the list for subsidized housing,
translation.zh: 你得提供两个月的工资条我才能帮你申请补贴性住房

translation.en: and even then, the wait list is long.
translation.zh: 即便如此 等的人也很多

translation.en: In the meantime, there's a mission over at St. Carmel's and they have beds open.
translation.zh: 与此同时 圣卡梅尔那边有个布道团他们有一些空床位

translation.en: I can't take Maddy there.
translation.zh: 我不能带马蒂去那里

translation.en: Sure you can.
translation.zh: 你当然可以

translation.en: Get there early. Wear Deet.
translation.zh: 早点过去 喷上避蚊胺

translation.en: Um, I'm sorry. Is there anything else that you could do for us here?
translation.zh: 抱歉 你就不能帮我们在这里找个地方吗？

translation.en: Honestly, without a job,
translation.zh: 说实话 你没有工作

translation.en: I can't do squat.
translation.zh: 我真的无能为力

translation.en: Okay. Um...
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I can't get a job if I can't afford day care.
translation.zh: 我没钱送孩子上日托中心怎么找工作？

translation.en: Well, we have access to subsidized day care grants once you have a job.
translation.zh: 等你找到工作后我们帮你申请日托补贴金

translation.en: I need a job to prove that I need day care in order to get a job?
translation.zh: 为了找到工作 我得有一份工作证明自己需要日托？

translation.en: What kind of fuckery is that?
translation.zh: 这算是什么狗屁逻辑？

translation.en: You know what?
translation.zh: 这样吧

translation.en: Why don't you try this?
translation.zh: 你去这里碰碰运气

translation.en: Value Maids?
translation.zh: 价值女仆？

translation.en: It's a local cleaning service, lot of turnover. Worth a shot.
translation.zh: 是一家本地的清洁公司活儿很多 值得一试

translation.en: I'll call them to tell them you're on your way.
translation.zh: 我会给他们打电话 说你要过去

translation.en: -Great. Yeah. Thank you. -[Jody] Yeah?
translation.zh: -太好了 谢谢你-不客气

translation.en: Can I bring Maddy?
translation.zh: 我能带麦蒂去吗？

translation.en: To a job interview?
translation.zh: 去参加工作面试吗？

translation.en: Mom!
translation.zh: 妈！

translation.en: Is Paula here?
translation.zh: 宝拉在吗？

translation.en: Paula Langley?
translation.zh: 宝拉兰利？

translation.en: I don't know who Paula is. We Airbnb'd this place from Basil.
translation.zh: 我不知道宝拉是谁我们从贝塞尔那里订的这间民宿

translation.en: -Hi, Mom. -[shouts]
translation.zh: 嗨 妈

translation.en: Maddy, Alex!
translation.zh: 麦蒂 亚历克斯！

translation.en: This is so exciting.
translation.zh: 我真是太开心了

translation.en: I can't believe you came to see this.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信你们亲自过来见证

translation.en: This is what all the brilliant painters and sculptors are doing in the art world.
translation.zh: 那些聪颖的画家和雕塑家就是这么创作艺术的

translation.en: This is me stepping up to a global collective of minds.
translation.zh: 这些作品表示我已经进步成全球性集体思维

translation.en: -Hey, Mom. -Archetypes. You know about it.
translation.zh: -嘿 妈妈-原型 你懂的

translation.en: That's what I'm representing here in cobalt.
translation.zh: 这就是我用钴蓝所展示出来的

translation.en: The hero, the every man, mentor, the mystic -the lover. -Mom.
translation.zh: -英雄、普通人、导师、情人-妈

translation.en: And there's Jungian archetypes.
translation.zh: 还有荣格原型

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me that you Airbnb'd your house?
translation.zh: 你怎么不告诉我你把自己的房子改成民宿了？

translation.en: I did, didn't I?
translation.zh: 我告诉过你 没有吗？

translation.en: I drove around two campgrounds looking for you.
translation.zh: 我开车找了两个露营地才找到你

translation.en: If you don't check-in with me, that's on you.
translation.zh: 你要是没问我 那是你的错

translation.en: I called you 14 times.
translation.zh: 我给你打了14个电话

translation.en: [Basil] Is that Alexandra? Bloody hell.
translation.zh: 那是亚历珊德拉吗？老天

translation.en: You disturbed the Airbnb people?
translation.zh: 你去打扰了民宿的客人？

translation.en: They're gonna leave a shit review now, you fair dinkum monster.
translation.zh: 他们会给差评了你这个不折不扣的坏蛋

translation.en: I can't deal with him and his fake Australian accent.
translation.zh: 我受不了他和他那假澳大利亚口音

translation.en: It's not fake. I was born in Perth, so...
translation.zh: 我的口音不是假的我出生在珀斯 所以…

translation.en: -I'm sure you were, Cilantro. -Don't call Basil Cilantro, Alex.
translation.zh: -你肯定是爱吃芫荽的拉丁佬-不许叫贝塞尔拉丁佬 亚历克斯

translation.en: Our identity is subjective.
translation.zh: 我们的身份具有主观性

translation.en: He's Australian, I'm French-Italian.
translation.zh: 他是澳大利亚人 我是法意混血

translation.en: In reality, we're both 100 percent Icelandic fairy.
translation.zh: 现实生活中 我俩都是百分百的冰岛童话仙女

translation.en: Can I talk to you in private? I'm in a rush, Mom.
translation.zh: -我能单独跟你聊聊吗？-我赶时间 妈

translation.en: No. Whatever you can say to me, you can say in front of him.
translation.zh: 不行 你要跟我说什么当着他的面说就好

translation.en: Because he is my life and business partner.
translation.zh: 因为他是我生命的全部也是我的生意伙伴

translation.en: What business?
translation.zh: 什么生意？

translation.en: Renting your house out, or making you sleep in an RV?
translation.zh: 让你把房子租出去的生意还是让你睡房车的生意？

translation.en: You're a malignant tumor.
translation.zh: 你就像一个恶性肿瘤

translation.en: -Go put some shrimp on the barbie. -All right. Enough.
translation.zh: -去往你的烧烤上放只虾吧-行了 别说了

translation.en: Out with it.
translation.zh: 直说吧

translation.en: -With--? Um... -Out with it.
translation.zh: -直说…-直说吧

translation.en: You want something from me, so just ask. What is it?
translation.zh: 你想找我帮忙 就直接说 什么事？

translation.en: Can you watch Maddy? I have a job interview. One hour, two max.
translation.zh: 你能帮我照看一下麦蒂吗？我要去面试工作 一个小时 最多两个

translation.en: Of course. She's my granddaughter.
translation.zh: 当然了 她是我外孙女

translation.en: She is always welcome to experience me and be a part of my life.
translation.zh: 不论何时 我都欢迎她了解我成为我生活的一部分

translation.en: Do you remember the rules? Use your phone.
translation.zh: 你还记得规矩吗？要勤看着点手机

translation.en: Use your phone and answer the phone. Okay, Mom?
translation.zh: 你要勤看着点手机 接电话可以吗 妈？

translation.en: -Nod that you hear me. -Nod.
translation.zh: -要是听到了 就点头-点头

translation.en: Don't drive her anywhere. Do you have food here? Can you give her lunch?
translation.zh: 不许开车带她去任何地方你这里有吃的吗？能给她做午饭吗？

translation.en: -We're a pub now, are we? -Anything goes wrong, call me.
translation.zh: -我们这里是酒馆了 对吧？-要是出问题 打给我

translation.en: Don't call Sean. Call me.
translation.zh: 别打给肖恩 打给我

translation.en: Come on, pumpky-poo.
translation.zh: 来吧 小南瓜派

translation.en: Be a good girl for Grammy and Cilantro. Love you.
translation.zh: 在外婆和拉丁佬这里乖乖的我爱你哦

translation.en: [Maddy] Bye, Mom!
translation.zh: 再见 妈妈！

translation.en: I love you!
translation.zh: 我爱你！

translation.en: Put some eyes on her.
translation.zh: 你盯着点她

translation.en: Hi, I'm looking for Value Maids?
translation.zh: 嗨 价值女仆公司是在这里吗？

translation.en: Sorry, the address says it's here.
translation.zh: 抱歉 地址写的是这里

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Yolanda] Yeah?
translation.zh: 谁？

translation.en: Hi, are you Yolanda?
translation.zh: 嗨 你是尤兰达吗？

translation.en: If this is another summons, shove it up your ass.
translation.zh: 如果又是来传唤我的 你可以滚了

translation.en: No, I'm Alex. Jody sent me.
translation.zh: 不 我是亚历克斯 乔迪让我来的

translation.en: Oh, one of Jody's girls.
translation.zh: 你是乔迪介绍来的啊

translation.en: Poor thing. Not you. Jody. Being a social worker sucks.
translation.zh: 真是可怜 我不是说你 是说乔迪当社工太糟心了

translation.en: So you're on parole?
translation.zh: 所以你是在假释期？

translation.en: Um, no.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: -Got any priors? -No.
translation.zh: -有前科吗？-没有

translation.en: I'll check. Got a problem with a background check?
translation.zh: 我会核实的能对你进行背景调查吗？

translation.en: -No. -We pay that, no exceptions.
translation.zh: -能-那是我们的薪资 所有人都一样 （时薪12美元 不提供清洁装备）

translation.en: Bump you up 50 cents once the background check clears and you go full-time.
translation.zh: 如果通过背景调查就涨50美分 你也可以转全职了

translation.en: Full-time, great.
translation.zh: 全职 很好

translation.en: Yes, but full-time ain't a 40-hour week.
translation.zh: 对 但全职不是指一周工作40个小时

translation.en: Company policy is you can't work more than six hours a day.
translation.zh: 根据公司政策 你每天工作不能超过六个小时

translation.en: More than six hours, bitches start throwing their backs out,
translation.zh: 一超过六个小时那些女工就腰酸背痛

translation.en: which breaks my heart, it does, but I can't be paying benefits.
translation.zh: 我会心疼的 真的但我又不能补贴你们

translation.en: So it's capped. Six hours a day, max.
translation.zh: 所以是有限制的 每天最多六小时

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: And tourist season's over, so I really only have one shift open.
translation.zh: 旅游季已经过去了所以我只有一个班次招人

translation.en: It's a weekly three-hour clean over on Fisher Island.
translation.zh: 是去费舍尔岛一户人家里打扫每周三个小时

translation.en: One shift. Okay.
translation.zh: 一个班次 没问题

translation.en: So uniform is 25 bucks. Comes out of your first check.
translation.zh: 所以 制服是25块从你第一张支票里扣除

translation.en: How soon do you think I could get proof of employment? A pay stub.
translation.zh: 你多久能给我提供就业证明？工资条

translation.en: Cart before the horse. This is a trial.
translation.zh: 你本末倒置了 现在才是试用期

translation.en: You ain't hired yet.
translation.zh: 我还没正式雇佣你

translation.en: -You got a car? -Yes.
translation.zh: -你有车吗？-有

translation.en: We provide a ferry pass.
translation.zh: 我们提供轮渡通行证

translation.en: But gas and toll, that's on you.
translation.zh: 但油钱和票钱 你得自己付

translation.en: So are cleaning supplies, rags, gloves,
translation.zh: 清洁用品、抹布、手套

translation.en: basically everything else except the Dyson.
translation.zh: 其他一切也基本都是自己准备除了戴森吸尘器

translation.en: If you don't return the Dyson to me directly after the shift,
translation.zh: 你的班次结束后要是没有把戴森吸尘器还我

translation.en: -you don't get paid. Understand? -Yes, I do.
translation.zh: -就拿不到工资 明白吗？-好 明白

translation.en: All right. Can you do there at 1:00? Let me get you the sheet.
translation.zh: 好 你能1点过去打扫吗？我把你排到工作表上

translation.en: Oh, so I'm starting today?
translation.zh: 所以我今天就开始上班？

translation.en: That's good news, ain't it, broke girl?
translation.zh: 这是好消息 对吧 破产女孩？

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 好极了

translation.en: ♪ I know what you wanna say ♪
♪ You think you know somethin' you don't ♪
-[Paula on phone] Hello. -[Alex] Hey, Mom. How's it going?
translation.zh: -喂-嘿 妈 情况怎么样？

translation.en: [Paula] She's a very powerful archetype.
translation.zh: 她真是一个令人震撼的原型

translation.en: A love child. That's what she is, her spirit resounds.
translation.zh: 一个很可爱的孩子 真的她的灵魂在回响

translation.en: -Did you feed her? -The spirit of my mother is in her.
translation.zh: -你给她吃饭没？-我母亲的灵魂在她体内

translation.en: She is a very powerful young lady. Our ancestry pulses through her blood.
translation.zh: 她是位很强大的年轻女士继承了我们祖先的脉动

translation.en: Sure does. Did you end up giving her lunch, though?
translation.zh: 当然了 但你给她吃午饭没？

translation.en: Of course. Grilled cheese and tomato with a side of straight Tom Collins
translation.zh: 当然了 烤芝士和烤番茄外加纯汤姆柯林斯鸡尾酒

translation.en: and now we are painting.
translation.zh: 现在我们在作画

translation.en: -Aren't we, sweetie? We're painting. -Awesome.
translation.zh: -对吧 亲爱的？我们在作画-真棒

translation.en: Hey. So listen. I got hired and I'm starting right now.
translation.zh: 嘿 听着 我面试成功了现在就得开始工作

translation.en: You should see what she's doing. And her hands, they're like sculptures.
translation.zh: 你应该看看她在做什么她的手 简直就像雕刻品

translation.en: -Listen, I'm starting right now. -Oh, honey. It's just so pretty.
translation.zh: -听着 我现在就得开始工作-亲爱的 真是太美了

translation.en: -Her painting. -It's a three-hour clean on Fisher Island.
translation.zh: -她的画作-我要去费舍尔岛做三个小时的清洁

translation.en: You should see her hands! Look at her hands!
translation.zh: 你应该看看她的手！看看她的手！

translation.en: I'll be back at the ferry at 4:05 and I'll be at yours at 5:30. Does that work?
translation.zh: 我会在4点05分回渡口5点半到你那里 可以吗？

translation.en: Don't we, sweetie?
translation.zh: 是吧 亲爱的？

translation.en: No phones. You're a half hour late.
translation.zh: 不许用手机 你迟到了半小时

translation.en: -I'm sorry. I'm-- -A half hour late.
translation.zh: -对不起 我…-迟到了半小时

translation.en: I know. I didn't have any signal and missed my turn. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我知道 手机没信号我转错了弯 对不起

translation.en: We'll reschedule.
translation.zh: 打扫时间再安排吧

translation.en: I can be done by 4:00, ma'am. I'm fast and I'm good.
translation.zh: 我4点前可以打扫完 女士我很利索 打扫得也干净

translation.en: I'd really rather you come back another time
translation.zh: 我宁愿你改天再来

translation.en: than do a shoddy job and throw a bunch of cleaning products around.
translation.zh: 做事毛手马脚把清洁用品扔得到处都是

translation.en: I understand. I won't disappoint you.
translation.zh: 我明白 我不会让你失望

translation.en: We're in NYC this weekend. Everything in the fridge can go
translation.zh: 我们这周末要去纽约冰箱里的东西都丢掉

translation.en: so my whole house doesn't smell like kombucha when I get back. Got it?
translation.zh: 这样我回来时家里不会是满满的一股康普茶味 明白吗？

translation.en: The fridge. I got it.
translation.zh: 冰箱 明白

translation.en: We compost. The bin is labeled "compost." Can you read or should I show you?
translation.zh: 我们会堆肥 垃圾桶上贴着“堆肥”你识字吗？还是我带你去认认？

translation.en: I can read.
translation.zh: 我识字

translation.en: Oh, God. Just put them on. I'll talk to her.
translation.zh: 老天 把他们接进来 我跟她说

translation.en: Tell them those terms are bullshit.
translation.zh: 告诉他们 那些条款就是胡扯

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Tick-tock. Should have rescheduled.
translation.zh: 时间紧张 我就该让你改天来的

translation.en: [Maddy] Mommy.
translation.zh: 妈妈

translation.en: It's a tiara.
translation.zh: 这是一顶王冠

translation.en: [Maddy] Mommy, are you okay?
translation.zh: 妈妈 你没事吧？

translation.en: -[Regina] Are you okay? -[Maddy] Are you okay, Mommy?
translation.zh: -你没事吧？-你没事吧 妈妈？

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Why are you on the floor?
translation.zh: 你怎么躺在地板上？

translation.en: Oh, what happened?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: I heard a thunk. I think you fainted.
translation.zh: 我听到“咚”的一声你应该是晕倒了

translation.en: Or are you a drug addict?
translation.zh: 还是你是个瘾君子？

translation.en: Uh, no. Um...
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: I'm so sorry. I skipped breakfast this morning. I'm fine.
translation.zh: 真的很抱歉 我今天没吃早饭 我没事

translation.en: Okay, well, just hold on. Don't get up fast.
translation.zh: 好 那你先等等 别太快起身

translation.en: Fuck.
translation.zh: 靠

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Balance bar.
translation.zh: 能量棒

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: This room is so nice.
translation.zh: 这个房间真漂亮

translation.en: Gosh, I've got a daughter and she would love this. How old is your kid?
translation.zh: 老天 我有个女儿 她肯定会喜欢你的孩子多大了？

translation.en: I don't have children.
translation.zh: 我没有孩子

translation.en: Isn't this a nursery?
translation.zh: 这不是婴儿房吗？

translation.en: Yeah, it's staged.
translation.zh: 对 这屋子是装饰过的

translation.en: We're getting ready to sell the house. So, uh... James had it staged.
translation.zh: 我们想卖掉这房子所以詹姆斯装饰了一下

translation.en: Well...
translation.zh: 那个…

translation.en: Not to be a task master, but...
translation.zh: 我不是想催你 但是…

translation.en: Obviously. Of course. I'm almost done too.
translation.zh: 当然 没问题 我马上就完成

translation.en: I just have this room left and...
translation.zh: 只剩下这个房间 所以…

translation.en: This room and all the lawn furniture.
translation.zh: 这个房间和草坪家具

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 可恶

translation.en: [voicemail] Your call has been forwarded to an automatic voice message system.
translation.zh: 您的电话已经被转至自动语音留言系统

translation.en: Your call has been forwarded to an automatic voice message system.
translation.zh: 您的电话已经被转至自动语音留言系统

translation.en: Maddy?
translation.zh: 麦蒂？

translation.en: Maddy, are you in here? Maddy?
translation.zh: 麦蒂 你在里面吗？麦蒂？

translation.en: Mom, can't you hear me calling? What the fuck?
translation.zh: 妈 你听不到我给你打电话吗？搞什么？

translation.en: Calling me? It was me that was calling you many, many times.
translation.zh: 给我打电话？明明是我给你打了无数次电话

translation.en: -Okay. Where is Maddy? -I have a life of my own, you know?
translation.zh: -好 麦蒂呢？-我有自己的生活 你知道吗？

translation.en: I can't be watching children all day. I have work to do. My own work, okay?
translation.zh: 我不能一整天都看孩子我有事要做 我自己的工作 好吗？

translation.en: Basil, are you in here? Open the door!
translation.zh: 贝塞尔 你在里面吗？开门！

translation.en: I bet you'd like to get in there with him. I see how you act around him.
translation.zh: 你肯定喜欢进去跟他聊聊我明白你对他的那种态度了

translation.en: Always flirting with him, sticking your little titties out.
translation.zh: 总是跟他调情 卖弄风骚

translation.en: What the fuck are you talking about? Where is Maddy?
translation.zh: 你在说什么？麦蒂呢？

translation.en: -I'm taking a nap. Jesus. -Why can't you be happy for me?
translation.zh: -我正睡着呢 老天-你为什么就不能为我开心？

translation.en: She's not here.
translation.zh: 她不在里面

translation.en: That I can still attract a quality man like him.
translation.zh: 为我能吸引像他这样的优质男人开心

translation.en: -Okay, where is she? -We couldn't reach you
translation.zh: -好了 她人呢？-我们联系不上你

translation.en: and your mom got tired, so we called Sean to get her.
translation.zh: 你妈妈太累 所以我们打给肖恩让他把孩子接走了

translation.en: You have never seen my potential. I am soaring on the cliff.
translation.zh: 你从未见识过我的潜力我飞得正高呢

translation.en: The sun beams towards me. It fills me with light!
translation.zh: 阳光照耀在我身上我的内心充满了光明！

translation.en: She's fine. She's all right. She's asleep.
translation.zh: 她没事 好好的 她睡着了

translation.en: We did bath time.
translation.zh: 我给她洗了澡

translation.en: She had buttered noodles.
translation.zh: 她吃了黄油面

translation.en: You hungry?
translation.zh: 你饿吗？

translation.en: Dinner's almost ready.
translation.zh: 晚饭快好了

translation.en: Irish stew.
translation.zh: 爱尔兰炖菜

translation.en: [screams] Fuck!
translation.zh: 靠！

translation.en: I haven't had a drink today. Come on.
translation.zh: 我今天没喝酒 拜托

translation.en: Alex.
translation.zh: 亚历克斯

translation.en: I'm trying here.
translation.zh: 我在努力

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: I'm not staying for dinner. I'm getting Maddy and I'm leaving.
translation.zh: 我不会留下来吃晚饭 我要带麦蒂走

translation.en: I went to a meeting today.
translation.zh: 我今天去参加了戒酒会

translation.en: Ethan took me.
translation.zh: 伊森带我去的

translation.en: Okay. That's...
translation.zh: 好 那真…

translation.en: Could you please sit?
translation.zh: 你能坐下来吗？

translation.en: -All right. Let's make a fucking mess! -[Maddy crying]
translation.zh: 好啊 那我们就乱来！

translation.en: Fuck!
translation.zh: 靠！

translation.en: You need to eat.
translation.zh: 你得吃点东西

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: I'm surprised Maddy was at your mom's.
translation.zh: 我没想到麦蒂会在你妈妈那里

translation.en: Is Paula finally on meds, or...?
translation.zh: 宝拉终于吃药了吗？还是…

translation.en: She was only supposed to be there a couple of hours.
translation.zh: 她本来只需要照看麦蒂几个小时

translation.en: You know how much I love Paula.
translation.zh: 你知道我有多爱宝拉

translation.en: I do, but... leaving Maddy with her?
translation.zh: 真的 但…把麦蒂交给她？

translation.en: I thought we had an agreement.
translation.zh: 我以为我们说好了的

translation.en: My mom's good with her for short periods of time.
translation.zh: 我妈照看她一小段时间还是可以的

translation.en: They, um... dance around or do art projects.
translation.zh: 她们…会跳舞或创作艺术

translation.en: She was alone when I got there.
translation.zh: 我过去的时候 就她一个人

translation.en: Playing with a vape and watching a cage match on TV.
translation.zh: 在玩电子烟 看电视上播的铁笼赛

translation.en: Where were you? Nobody could find you.
translation.zh: 你去哪了？谁都找不到你

translation.en: I got a job on Fisher Island, and I didn't have service.
translation.zh: 我在费舍尔岛找到了一份工作那里手机没信号

translation.en: A job?
translation.zh: 工作？

translation.en: How are you gonna work? Who's gonna watch Maddy?
translation.zh: 你怎么工作？谁来照看麦蒂？

translation.en: Not your mom.
translation.zh: 你妈可不行

translation.en: I'll figure it out. It's my business, Sean, okay?
translation.zh: 我会想出办法 肖恩这是我的事 好吗？

translation.en: Could you eat a little?
translation.zh: 你能吃点吗？

translation.en: You're hurting my feelings.
translation.zh: 你这样我很受伤

translation.en: I'm not eating your fucking stew, okay?
translation.zh: 我不想吃你做的炖菜 好吗？

translation.en: Stop asking.
translation.zh: 你别再让我吃了

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: You're officially freaking me out.
translation.zh: 你真的吓到我了

translation.en: Going AWOL in the middle of the night?
translation.zh: 大半夜的玩失踪？

translation.en: Leaving my child in a dangerous situation with a batshit crazy person?
translation.zh: 把我的孩子交给一个疯子照顾让她置身险境？

translation.en: I mean, are you feeling okay?
translation.zh: 你觉得这样没问题吗？

translation.en: -That's not funny. Don't do that. -What?
translation.zh: -这不好笑 不要这么做-怎样？

translation.en: I'm not insane. You're the one that woke me up in a rage
translation.zh: 我不是疯子 是你因为一些脏盘子

translation.en: over some dirty dishes and punched a hole in the wall.
translation.zh: 激怒我 然后照墙上砸了个洞

translation.en: I drank too much. I went too far.
translation.zh: 我当时喝多了 有些过激

translation.en: I went too far, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我过激了 对不起

translation.en: I picked glass out of Maddy's hair last night.
translation.zh: 我昨晚从麦蒂的头发里挑出了玻璃渣

translation.en: I didn't mean for it to be that close to her.
translation.zh: 我不是故意把盘子砸到离她那么近的地方

translation.en: Hey, I would never hurt her, you know that.
translation.zh: 嘿 我永远不会伤害她 你知道的

translation.en: I don't know that.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: You serious right now?
translation.zh: 你现在是认真的吗？

translation.en: Okay, what's the plan here?
translation.zh: 好 那你有什么打算？

translation.en: Where are you gonna go? Hmm?
translation.zh: 你要去哪？

translation.en: I pay all the bills.
translation.zh: 账单都是我在付

translation.en: Let you hang out with my friends,
translation.zh: 让你和我的朋友一起玩

translation.en: I let you move into my trailer, you drink my beer, eat my food.
translation.zh: 我让你搬进我的拖车里你喝我的啤酒 吃我的食物

translation.en: I let you mooch off me.
translation.zh: 我让你占我的便宜

translation.en: I do everything for you.
translation.zh: 我为你做了一切

translation.en: If you walk out of here, you'll have no one.
translation.zh: 你要是离开这里就没有可依赖的人了

translation.en: I know. I'm well aware of how completely alone and fucked I am.
translation.zh: 我知道 我很清楚自己会孤身一人无依无靠

translation.en: But I won't pick glass out of Maddy's hair again. Not gonna happen.
translation.zh: 但我不会再从麦蒂的头发里找玻璃渣 绝对不会

translation.en: Hey, where are you going?
translation.zh: 嘿 你去哪？

translation.en: -Hey. Hey, Maddy, sweetie. -Daddy.
translation.zh: -嘿 麦蒂 亲爱的-爸爸

translation.en: Daddy's right here, okay?
translation.zh: 爸爸就在这里 好吗？

translation.en: Where are you going, Alex?
translation.zh: 你要去哪 亚历克斯？

translation.en: What's the plan here?
translation.zh: 你有什么打算？

translation.en: Okay, why don't you think for just one second?
translation.zh: 好的 你要不要好好想想？

translation.en: Would you please look at me? Alex?
translation.zh: 你能看着我吗？亚历克斯？

translation.en: Why don't you come back inside?
translation.zh: 你跟我回屋去吧

translation.en: -We can talk about this. -There you go, honey. It's okay.
translation.zh: -我们可以好好聊聊-好了 亲爱的 没事了

translation.en: Where are you gonna go?
translation.zh: 你要去哪？

translation.en: Hey, you can't steal my kid!
translation.zh: 嘿 你不能偷走我女儿！

translation.en: Sweetie, Daddy's right here, okay? Where are you gonna go?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 爸爸就在这里 好吗？你要去哪？

translation.en: Hey! Alex!
translation.zh: 嘿！亚历克斯！

translation.en: Alex!
translation.zh: 亚历克斯！

translation.en: [Maddy] "Shoop."
translation.zh: “睡觉觉”

translation.en: "Shoop," Mommy.
translation.zh: “睡觉觉” 妈妈

translation.en: -Where are we going? -I don't know. I need a second, all right?
translation.zh: -我们去哪？-我不知道 让我想想 好吗？

translation.en: -Home. -We can't go home right now, okay?
translation.zh: -回家吧-我们现在不能回家 知道吗？

translation.en: Look, Mommy, look.
translation.zh: 你看 妈妈 你看啊

translation.en: I'm gonna take this real quick.
translation.zh: 我很快接一个电话

translation.en: Yolanda, the Dyson, I know.
translation.zh: 尤兰达 戴森吸尘器 我知道

translation.en: -Regina's not happy with your cleaning. -What?
translation.zh: -雷吉娜对你的工作不满意-什么？

translation.en: She called and said you did a crap job on the furniture, left streaks.
translation.zh: 她打电话了 说你家具没擦干净留下了水印

translation.en: -Go back, and do it right. -Window, Mommy!
translation.zh: -马上回去打扫干净-打开窗户 妈妈！

translation.en: -Yes, honey. -Mommy.
translation.zh: -知道了 亲爱的-妈妈

translation.en: Okay, okay, hold on. I'm gonna...
translation.zh: 好 等一下 我马上…

translation.en: Nope, I can't. I'm in Port Hampstead, and I have my daughter with me.
translation.zh: 不行 我去不了 我在汉普斯特港还带着我女儿

translation.en: Not my problem. You want this job? You wanna get paid? Go back.
translation.zh: 我不管 你想要这份工作吗？想拿到薪水吗？那就回去

translation.en: -It's a 45-minute ferry each way. -Then you better get cracking.
translation.zh: -单程的轮渡就是45分钟-那你最好赶紧出发

translation.en: You're flying. [giggling]
translation.zh: 你在飞

translation.en: -Hold on, all right? -Look, Mommy.
translation.zh: -等一下 好吗？-你看 妈妈

translation.en: We don't have time for this, Maddy.
translation.zh: 我们没时间玩了 麦蒂

translation.en: Schmariel! [screaming]
translation.zh: 施密瑞尔！

translation.en: We'll go back and get Schmariel. We're gonna get Schmariel later.
translation.zh: 我们会再来找施密瑞尔我们等下再回来找施密瑞尔

translation.en: -I'm getting Schmariel now. -Schmariel!
translation.zh: -我现在就去找-施密瑞尔！

translation.en: I'm getting her right now. Okay. All right.
translation.zh: 我现在就去找 好了 别叫了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: You okay? You okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: You're okay. You're okay.
translation.zh: 你没事

translation.en: Jesus Christ! She was in there?
translation.zh: 老天！她刚才在车里？

translation.en: Yes, my daughter was fucking in the car! She was in there, you fucking moron!
translation.zh: 对 我女儿刚才在车里！她在车里 你这白痴！

translation.en: You hit my fucking car. You could have killed my daughter.
translation.zh: 你撞毁了我的车 差点害死我女儿

translation.en: Get the fuck away from me!
translation.zh: 离我远点！

translation.en: We live in here, you dipshit!
translation.zh: 我们住在这里 你这笨蛋！

translation.en: Oh, you're so good.
translation.zh: 你真可爱

translation.en: And then shine the light.
translation.zh: 然后把灯打开

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Here you go, ma'am.
translation.zh: 给你 女士

translation.en: -You're giving me a ticket? -Parking in the meridian is illegal.
translation.zh: -你给我开罚单？-把车停在中间线上违法

translation.en: I can't pay for this.
translation.zh: 我没钱

translation.en: If you have any personal items you'd like to retrieve from the car
translation.zh: 如果在我们把车子拖走前

translation.en: before the tow truck gets here, now is your time.
translation.zh: 你还想拿一些私人物品 就赶紧去吧

translation.en: And who pays for the tow truck?
translation.zh: 拖车的钱谁付？

translation.en: You have someone who can pick you up?
translation.zh: 有谁能来接你吗？

translation.en: If you don't have anybody to call, we can drop you at home.
translation.zh: 如果没有人能来 我们可以送你回家

translation.en: Um, no, no, no. I've got-- I've got somebody. Thank you so much.
translation.zh: 不用 我…有人来接我 非常感谢

translation.en: Can you make the call now? I gotta clear the meridian.
translation.zh: 那你能现在打电话吗？我得清理中间线

translation.en: -You can't stay here. All right. -Got it.
translation.zh: -你不能待在这里 好-知道了

translation.en: Were you speeding at the time?
translation.zh: 你当时有没有超速？

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: [Hank] She's out like a light.
translation.zh: 她已经睡熟了

translation.en: Last time I saw her, she was still in diapers.
translation.zh: 上次我见她时 她还穿尿不湿呢

translation.en: I would like to see her more than I get to.
translation.zh: 我很想见她 但总是见不着

translation.en: So where to? Port Hampstead?
translation.zh: 你们去哪？汉普斯特港？

translation.en: Sean still in that single-wide?
translation.zh: 肖恩还住在那个独栋移动房屋里吗？

translation.en: No, we're, um...
translation.zh: 不 我们…

translation.en: We're not gonna go home.
translation.zh: 我们不回家

translation.en: Oh. Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Where to, then?
translation.zh: 那你们去哪？

translation.en: I mean, I'd invite you back to my house...
translation.zh: 我很想带你们回我家…

translation.en: but it's a school night, and Charlene and the kids--
translation.zh: 但今天是正常上学的日子夏琳和孩子们…

translation.en: No, yeah. Of course.
translation.zh: 不用 没关系

translation.en: Maybe, um...
translation.zh: 或许…

translation.en: Would you mind just dropping us at the ferry station?
translation.zh: 你能把我们送去轮渡站吗？

translation.en: I'll have my friend pick us up.
translation.zh: 我会找朋友接我们

translation.en: What were you thinking pulled over like that?
translation.zh: 你怎么刚才把车子停在中间线上？

translation.en: It's just that's... a reckless thing to do.
translation.zh: 那样…那样太没脑子了

translation.en: Reminds me of your mother.
translation.zh: 让我想起了你母亲

translation.en: Can we just not talk?
translation.zh: 我们可以不说话吗？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Would you mind pulling over real quick and let me run to the dollar store?
translation.zh: 你能停一下 让我去趟一元店吗？

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Let's put you down. There you go.
translation.zh: 我把你放下 好了

translation.en: You, uh... You need anything else
translation.zh: 你…你还需要你老爸

translation.en: from your old pop?
translation.zh: 帮你什么吗？

translation.en: We're all set, thanks again.
translation.zh: 不用了 再次谢谢你

translation.en: Bye-bye, honey bee.
translation.zh: 再见了 小蜜蜂

translation.en: Boat.
translation.zh: 船

translation.en: No, not tonight. We're just gonna get a little rest in.
translation.zh: 不 今晚不行 我们得先休息一下

translation.en: Wait, wait. Come here, baby girl.
translation.zh: 等一下 过来 宝贝女儿

translation.en: -This was in my shoe. -What's in your shoe?
translation.zh: -这东西在我鞋里-什么在你鞋里？

translation.en: -This was in my shoe. -What the heck?
translation.zh: -这东西在我鞋里-怎么回事？

translation.en: What the heck?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I put it in my shoe.
translation.zh: 我把它放进我鞋里

translation.en: You're fixing my earrings, all right?
translation.zh: 你在帮我修耳环吗？

translation.en: How do we unclip this?
translation.zh: 要怎么把夹子松开呢？

translation.en: Well...
translation.zh: 好了…

translation.en: Okey-dokey. I got you a surprise. You wanna see a surprise?
translation.zh: 好啦 我要给你一个惊喜你想看惊喜吗？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Ta-da!
translation.zh: 嗒哒！

translation.en: We got Schmariel.
translation.zh: 我们有施密瑞尔

translation.en: All better.
translation.zh: 它还比以前更好了呢

translation.en: [woman on PA] Announcing the arrival of Ferry 41.
translation.zh: 41号渡轮已经抵达

translation.en: Ferry 41 arriving.
translation.zh: 41号渡轮已抵达
